original_text: The people of Israel continued to serve the Lord while Joshua and the old men were still alive. Joshua and those men had seen everything that the Lord had done to help Israel.
korean_text: 이스라엘이 여호수아가 사는 날 동안과 여호수아 뒤에 생존한 장로들 곧 여호와께서 이스라엘을 위하여 행하신 모든 일을 아는 자들이 사는 날 동안 여호와를 섬겼더라

sentences.original_text: The people of Israel continued to serve the Lord
while Joshua and the old men were still alive
Joshua and those men had seen everything
sentences.korean_translation: 여호수아와 그 사람들은 모든 것을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: that the Lord had done to help Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 이스라엘을 돕기 위해 행하신 모든 것을
